<NEW - WHEELIE>

There was a careful pause from WHEELIE as h=
e nodded over at Astra and Firehorn, and then he spoke simply, "Until the d=
ay we meet again, I hope that this is not the end."

At this point, recogni=
zing the solemnity of the room, WHEELIE depowered his weapon and went to sh=
eathe it.  Even if this group would end being adversaries, he wuold not ins=
tigate a conflict with them or endanger what they ahd built here, whatever =
it was with things he did not recognize, beyond even what he had seen of th=
e Quintessons and of Unicron in his own way.

Giving them an example of a C=

er to the central chamber.
